00035 #ifndef _LUSTREAPI_INTERNAL_H_
00036 #define _LUSTREAPI_INTERNAL_H_
00037 
00038 #include <libcfs/util/param.h>
00039 #include <uapi_kernelcomm.h>
00040 
00041 #define WANT_PATH   0x1
00042 #define WANT_FSNAME 0x2
00043 #define WANT_FD     0x4
00044 #define WANT_INDEX  0x8
00045 #define WANT_ERROR  0x10
00046 
00047 /* mount point listings in /proc/mounts */
00048 #ifndef PROC_MOUNTS
00049 #define PROC_MOUNTS "/proc/mounts"
00050 #endif
00051 
00052 int get_root_path(int want, char *fsname, int *outfd, char *path, int index);
00053 int root_ioctl(const char *mdtname, int opc, void *data, int *mdtidxp,
00054                int want_error);
00055 
00067 enum param_filter {
00068         FILTER_BY_EXACT,
00069         FILTER_BY_FS_NAME,
00070         FILTER_BY_PATH
00071 };
00072 
00073 int get_lustre_param_path(const char *obd_type, const char *filter,
00074                           enum param_filter type, const char *param_name,
00075                           glob_t *param);
00076 int get_lustre_param_value(const char *obd_type, const char *filter,
00077                            enum param_filter type, const char *param_name,
00078                            char *value, size_t val_len);
00079 
00080 static inline int
00081 poolpath(glob_t *pool_path, const char *fsname, char *pathname)
00082 {
00083         int rc;
00084 
00085         if (fsname != NULL)
00086                 rc = get_lustre_param_path("lov", fsname, FILTER_BY_FS_NAME,
00087                                            "pools", pool_path);
00088         else
00089                 rc = get_lustre_param_path("lov", pathname, FILTER_BY_PATH,
00090                                            "pools", pool_path);
00091         return rc;
00092 }
00093 
00094 #define LLAPI_LAYOUT_MAGIC 0x11AD1107 /* LLAPILOT */
00095 
00096 /* Helper functions for testing validity of stripe attributes. */
00097 
00098 static inline bool llapi_stripe_size_is_aligned(uint64_t size)
00099 {
00100         return (size & (LOV_MIN_STRIPE_SIZE - 1)) == 0;
00101 }
00102 
00103 static inline bool llapi_stripe_size_is_too_big(uint64_t size)
00104 {
00105         return size >= (1ULL << 32);
00106 }
00107 
00108 static inline bool llapi_stripe_count_is_valid(int64_t count)
00109 {
00110         return count >= -1 && count <= LOV_MAX_STRIPE_COUNT;
00111 }
00112 
00113 static inline bool llapi_stripe_index_is_valid(int64_t index)
00114 {
00115         return index >= -1 && index <= LOV_V1_INSANE_STRIPE_COUNT;
00116 }
00117 
00118 /* Compatibility macro for legacy llapi functions that use "offset"
00119  * terminology instead of the preferred "index". */
00120 #define llapi_stripe_offset_is_valid(os) llapi_stripe_index_is_valid(os)
00121 
00122 /*
00123  * Kernel communication for Changelogs and HSM requests.
00124  */
00125 int libcfs_ukuc_start(struct lustre_kernelcomm *l, int groups, int rfd_flags);
00126 int libcfs_ukuc_stop(struct lustre_kernelcomm *l);
00127 int libcfs_ukuc_get_rfd(struct lustre_kernelcomm *link);
00128 int libcfs_ukuc_msg_get(struct lustre_kernelcomm *l, char *buf, int maxsize,
00129                         int transport);
00130 #endif /* _LUSTREAPI_INTERNAL_H_ */
